testcase.name: Verify that a user can click on the NOVODAILY logo and refresh the homepage.
testcase.system-out: Given The user navigate to novoDaily website................................passed And accept the cookie.......................................................passed Then wait for for the homepage to load for 3 seconds........................passed When The User click on the NovoDaily font logo..............................passed And verify that the logo of NovoDaily is displayed on the homepage..........passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
